name: Black Cat Pirates

captain.name: Captain Kuro
captain.tenure: Former captain (supposedly dead), returning for this attack

keyMoments.moment: Kuro meets with the crew at the shore
keyMoments.significance: The Black Cat Pirates prepare for their attack on Syrup Village at dawn, showing they're still loyal to Kuro after three years.

description: The Black Cat Pirates are a pirate crew from the East Blue led by Captain Kuro. After Kuro faked his death three years ago, the crew has been led by Jango. They are reuniting with their original captain for one final mission to attack Syrup Village.
